description.message: Chrome extension that changes the tone of websites using an overlay.

shortcutHelp.message: Assign a keyboard shortcut to activate the extension for the current website.

onHelp.message: Turn on the overlay for the current website.

onDisabledHelp.message: Due to browser limitations, this website cannot support an overlay.

offHelp.message: Turn off the overlay for the current website.

globalHelp.message: When enabled, the shared global settings are applied.

opacityHelp.message: Change the intensity of the overlay. Use the selector above to adjust how the overlay blends with the website.

resetWebsiteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset the settings for this website?

resetAllConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset the settings for all websites?
